participant_1.background:
I enjoyed Comic Con with my husband last year.
I'm not allowed to have pets because I live with my parents and they are allergic.
i do not like my job.
I enjoy sharing my love of music and unicorns with others.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.

participant_2.background:
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
i wait for something interesting to happen each day.
My weight is 160 pounds.

content.text: What is your favorite activity to do outside of work?
I like to practice my guitar. I am hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
That's great! What do you like to play?
I play a variety of genres. I am best at blues and country, but I also like to play rock and roll.
Oh, I love country music. Do you have a favorite artist?
I like a lot of different artists, but my favorite is probably Eric Church.
I like him too! He's really talented.
Yeah, he is. I've seen him in concert a few times. He puts on a great show.
I've always wanted to see him in concert. I'm not sure if he's ever come to my city.
He's been to a lot of places. Hopefully he'll come to your city soon.
